commit message:
Bump version number to v0.0.2

Issue #13

Use SwipeRefreshLayout to refresh on scroll down

Issue #11
This also covers Issue #7

Checkout this awesome tuitorial
https://www.bignerdranch.com/blog/implementing-swipe-to-refresh/
Remove toast when using button at top
Use icon instead of text in menu

Use own add icon instead of the one provided by android

This is the way Google recommends, since R.drawables are bound to change based on devices etc.
